CFEGF.summary: China Nonferrous Gold Limited explores, mines, and develops mineral properties. It primarily holds a 100% interest in the Pakrut gold project located in the southern Tien-Shan Fold belt, Tajikistan. The company was formerly known as Kryso Resources Corporation Limited and changed its name to China Nonferrous Gold Limited in October 2013. The company was incorporated in 2013 and is based in George Town, Cayman Islands. China Nonferrous Gold Limited is a subsidiary of China Nonferrous Metals Mining (Group) Co. Limited.
